lead_paragraph: When teams fall behind, they often try to shoot themselves back into games and lose focus on executing offensively. Kansas did that Sunday, and it played right into No. 3 Baylor's hands.
snippet: When teams fall behind, they often try to shoot themselves back into games and lose focus on executing offensively. Kansas did that Sunday, and it played right into No. 3 Baylor's hands....

headline.main: No. 3 Baylor Routs Kansas 90-43 to Improve to 13-1
headline.print_headline: No. 3 Baylor Routs Kansas 90-43 to Improve to 13-1
